result.eng: Continous work will be involved to reach the target.
result.ga: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amach
result.orig: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amach
result.html: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amachContinous work will be involved to reach the target.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ obair leanúnaċ i gceist ċun an sprioc a ḃaint amaċContinous work will be involved to reach the target.

result.eng: He was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ga: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.orig: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.html: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a atharHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé réiḋ le díoltas a ḃaint amaċ as bás a aṫarHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.

result.eng: We have to make profit.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid brabús a bhaint
result.orig: Caithfidh muid brabús a bhaint
result.html: Caithfidh muid brabús a bhaintWe have to make profit.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid brabús a ḃaintWe have to make profit.

result.eng: We need to take a chance and try it.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.orig: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.html: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid dul sa seans agus triail a ḃaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.

result.eng: I managed to reach my destination.
result.ga: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amachI managed to reach my destination.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ liom mo ċeann scríbe a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach my destination.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ga: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.orig: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.html: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí é i ndiaiḋ di sásaṁ a ḃaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.

result.eng: He managed to reach a high level.
result.ga: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amachHe managed to reach a high level.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ leis leiḃéal ard a ḃaint amaċHe managed to reach a high level.

result.eng: I managed to reach the top.
result.ga: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amachI managed to reach the top.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ liom an barr a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach the top.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amachHe would do anything to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé rud ar biṫ ċun díoltas a ḃaint amaċHe would do anything to take revenge.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: People can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ga: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.orig: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.html: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amachPeople can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir le daoine aisling a ḃeiṫ acu agus í a ḃaint amaċPeople can have dreams and achieve them.

result.eng: All they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ga: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amachAll they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ ar a intinn aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċAll they wanted was to take revenge.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: I failed to reach the top.
result.ga: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.orig: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.html: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amachI failed to reach the top.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeip orm an barr a ḃaint amaċI failed to reach the top.

result.eng: You will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ga: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.orig: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.html: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú in ann leaḃra a ṫaḃairt aḃaile agus úsáid a ḃaint as na ríoṁairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.orig: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.html: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an Eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ag dul di ciall a ḃaint as imeaċtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.orig: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht

result.ponchtml: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a ḃeaṫa a ḃaint i dtír leis an ḃlagadóireaċtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
